```{r}
library(tidyverse)
diamonds
```

Question 1:
```{r}
diamonds_sum <-
diamonds %>%
  count(cut) %>%
  left_join(diamonds, by = c("cut" = "cut"))

ggplot(diamonds, 
       aes(x = price)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count", color = "blue", 
                 fill = "lightblue",
                 bins = 10) +
  facet_wrap(~cut) +
  #ylim(c(0,7500)) +
  theme_minimal()
```


Question 2:
```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, 
       aes(x = price)) +
  geom_histogram(stat = "count", color = "blue", fill = "lightblue") +
  facet_wrap(~cut) +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "tomato"),
        axis.line = element_line(arrow = arrow()))
```
